content: General Command Description ⇧ ⌘ P Show Command Palette ⌘ P Quick Open, Go to File ⇧ ⌘ N New window / instance ⌘ W Close window / instance ⌘ , User Settings ⌘ K ⌘ S Keyboard Shortcuts
title: VScode Shortcuts

content: Basic editing Command Description ⌘ X Cut line(empty selection) ⌥ ↑ / ⌥ ↓ Move line down / up ⇧ ⌥ ↑ / ⇧ ⌥ ↓ Copy line down / up ⌘ Enter / ⇧ ⌘ Enter Insert line below / above ⇧ ⌘ \ Jump to matching bracket ⌘ [ / ⌘ ] Indent / Outdent line Home / End Go to beginning / end of line ⌘ ↑ / ⌘ ↓ Go to beginning / end of file ⌘ K ⌘ C Add line comment ⌘ K ⌘ U Remove line comment ⌘ / Toggle line comment ⇧ ⌥ A Toggle block comment ⌥ Z Toggle word wrap ⌘ L Select current line
title: VScode Shortcuts

content: Search and replace Command Description ⌘ F Find ⌥ ⌘ F Replace ⌘ G / ⇧ ⌘ G Find next / previous ⌥ Enter Select all occurrences of Find match ⌘ D Add selection to next Find match ⌘ K ⌘ D Move last selection to next Find match
title: VScode Shortcuts

content: Rich languages editing Command Description ⌘ I Trigger suggestion ⇧ ⌥ F Format document ⌘ . Quick Fix ⌘ K M Change file language
title: VScode Shortcuts

content: Navigation Command Description ⌘ T Show all Symbols ⌘ P Go to File ⌃ G Go to Line ⇧ ⌘ O Go to Symbol ⇧ ⌘ M Show Problems panel ⌃ Tab Navigate editor group history ⌃ - Go back
title: VScode Shortcuts

content: Editor management Command Description ⌘ W Close editor ⌘ K F Close editor ⌘ \ Split editor
title: VScode Shortcuts

content: File management Command Description ⌘ N New File ⌘ O Open File ⌘ W Close ⌘ K ⌘ W Close All ⌘ K P Copy path of active file ⌘ K R Reveal active file in Finder ⌘ K O Show active file in new window / instance
title: VScode Shortcuts

content: Display Command Description ⌃ ⌘ F Toggle full screen ⌘ = / ⇧ ⌘ - Zoom in / out ⌘ B Toggle Sidebar visibility ⇧ ⌘ E Show Explorer / Toggle focus ⇧ ⌘ F Show Search ⇧ ⌘ D Show Debug ⇧ ⌘ X Show Extensions ⇧ ⌘ H Replace in files ⇧ ⌘ J Toggle Search details ⇧ ⌘ V Open Markdown preview ⌘ K V Open Markdown preview to the side ⌘ K Z Zen Mode (Esc Esc to exit)
title: VScode Shortcuts

content: Integrated terminal Command description ⌃ ` Show integrated terminal ⌃ ⇧ ` Create new terminal
title: VScode Shortcuts
